name: Name
regulation: The rules below define whether an order applies to a specific offer or not

description.title: Customize Offer Message
description.helperText: Message to display when the customer applies the offer
description.label: Add Message

promotionText.label: Promotion Message
promotionText.helperText: Message to display in the offer description for the customer

usage.title: Usage Limit
usage.subtitle: Specify the maximum number of times this offer can be used before being disabled

quantity_orders.title: Order Quantity
quantity_orders.subtitle: Define a maximum or range of orders for which the offer will apply

amount.title: Amounts
amount.subtitle: If the total order amount exceeds the set value, the rule is considered valid

amountCategory.title: Amounts by Category
amountCategory.subtitle: Define a maximum or range of amounts by category for which the offer will apply

product.title: Products
product.subtitle: Select the product(s) that can be added to the order under this offer

category.title: Categories
category.subtitle: Define one or more categories to which the offer can apply

address.title: Address
address.subtitle: Define one or more locations to which the offer can apply

orderCountByTime.title: Number of Orders in a Time Interval
orderCountByTime.subtitle: Define a number of orders within a time interval for which the offer will apply.

amountSpentByTime.title: Total Amount Spent in a Time Interval
amountSpentByTime.subtitle: Define a maximum amount spent within a time interval for which the offer will apply.

longevity.title: Customer Tenure on the Platform
longevity.subtitle: Define a time period for which the offer can apply.

specificClientList.title: Specific List of Eligible Customers
specificClientList.subtitle: Define a list of customers to whom the offer can apply.

clientUsage.title: Usage Limit per Customer
clientUsage.subtitle: Set the maximum number of times an individual user can use the same offer

twoForOneOffer.min: You must add at least one 2x1 rule

clientUsage.integer: Usage count must be an integer
clientUsage.positive: Usage count must be a positive number

product.min: You must add a product rule

variant.required: You must select a variant from the list

address.min: You must add at least one address

category.min: You must add a category rule
category.min-1: You must add at least one category

quantity.positive: Quantity must be a positive number

amount.positive: Amount must be a positive number

usage.positive: Usage must be a positive number

quantity_orders.positive: Quantity must be a positive number

product.required: At least one product is required, or remove the rule

category.required: At least one category is required, or remove the rule

productToInclude.min: You must add at least one product

specificClientList.min-1: You must add at least one customer

longevity.positive: Quantity must be a positive number

amountSpentByTime.positive: Amount must be a positive number

orderCountByTime.positive: Quantity must be a positive number

incomeWithOffer: Revenue from Orders That Used the Offer
avgIncomeWithOffer: Average Revenue from Orders That Used the Offer

offerInactive.title: Your Offer Is Not Yet Active!
offerInactive.subtitle: The start date of your offer has not yet been reached, so there are no results to display.
